location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: An index, organised by area and then alphabetically by name, can be found at folios 149-155.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 157; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the file also contains an original printed pagination sequence (138 pp).

mods.abstract: The volume contains brief biographical statements on individuals active in Iraq, often including comments on their character, reputation, political affiliations, command of armed forces, and attitudes towards European and regional powers.
